nodes.text: A Jedi lightsaber was originally owned by Jedi Master Eno Cordova. Cordova's lightsaber had a blue blade and a kyber crystal core.

Eno Cordova's lightsaber first appeared in the 2019 Star Wars comic Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple 1 written by Matthew Rosenberg. In the video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, the player can collect Eno Cordova lightsaber components throughout the game to customize Cal Kestis' lightsaber, similar to the default Jaro Tapal lightsaber parts. However, unlike Tapal's lightsaber, the Eno Cordova lightsaber parts do not resemble the weapon used by Cordova in the Star Wars: Jedi Fallen Order - Dark Temple comic book mini-series.
